description: The Borrower shall maintain a Debt Service Coverage Ratio of not less than 1
The Borrower shall maintain a Leverage Ratio of not greater than 3
The Borrower shall maintain a Current Ratio of not less than 1
Monthly unaudited financial statements shall be delivered within 20 days after the end of each month
deadline_rule: within 20 days after the end of each month

description: Quarterly unaudited financial statements shall be delivered within 30 days after the end of each quarter, including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement
deadline_rule: within 30 days after the end of each quarter, including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement

description: Annual audited financial statements shall be delivered within 90 days after the fiscal year end, prepared by an independent certified public accountant acceptable to the Lender
deadline_rule: within 90 days after the fiscal year end, prepared by an independent certified public accountant acceptable to the Lender

description: The Borrower shall promptly notify the Lender of any Material Adverse Change affecting the business, operations, or financial condition of the Borrower
The Borrower shall immediately inform the Lender of any Default or Event of Default that has occurred or is reasonably likely to occur
Breach of any covenant (with a 30-day cure period for non-financial covenants)
